name: 击魂Z / Beat The Soul Z
name_original: 击魂Z / Beat The Soul Z
description:
《Beat The Soul Z》 is a 2D pixel style platformer action game. The player takes on the role of the main character and plays the game from different perspectives, and cooperate with his soul to fight, explore, and pass the level.

Game features:
Variety of gameplay: There are different ways to play from different perspectives.
Crisp combat: You can play gorgeous combos with different skills.
Level Differences: Each big level has a different experience.
Out of Body: Can control the protagonist's out of body to match attacks, exploration, and pass the level.

Background of the story:
It is a amazing world, a world where many stories have been told through the ages, and this time it is a story of the soul.
One day, a mysterious boy who inherited the mask joined a mysterious organization, he acquired soul power, but was sent to investigate his kind. Why did the power of the soul suddenly appear in the world? What does it have to do with Evilkind?
